reviews.text: One of the best beers on the planet... Itâs taste is unique, magnificent and manly....
0,5l can. Pours golden yellow with medium, short-lasting white head. Tastes herbal-soury, with a touch of bitterness at palate.
I like this beer, it is industrial but good for summer times. It is one of the best industrial beers. It is good that it have flavor of beer not like other flavor like water.
